title: "Madrasa Students In Uttar Pradesh To Be Taught Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "The Uttar Pradesh government under a pilot project is introducing teaching modules in artificial intelligence in madrasas to train students in the upcoming technology as well as align these institutions with mainstream educational developments."
